chapter.name: Dark Angels
chapter.flavor: The Dark Angels are the Progenitor Chapter formed from the First Legion of Primarch Lion El'Johnson. Though through their secretive nature their allegiance and actions may be questionable, they are some of the most deadly and well-armed Astartes in the Imperium

artifact.name: Sword of Secrets
artifact.description: An ancient power sword, one of the sacred Heavenfall Blades carved from the core of an obsidian meteorite that struck the Rock thousands of years past

artifact.name: The Protector
artifact.description: A suit of armour which history starts in the late M37 where Master MEthias of the 5th Company survived a close range battle cannon shot wearing this armour. Henceforth this suit of armour has been given to high ranking Dark Angels until eventually it became one of the symbols of office of the Chapter Master

artifact.name: Lion's Wrath
artifact.description: Constructed during the Great Scouring shortly after the destruction of Caliban, this combi-plasma bolter is a badge of office for the Chapter Master of the Dark Angels since time immemorial

artifact.name: Lion Helm
artifact.description: Said to have been worn by the Primarch Lion El'Johnson and takes form of a winged Mark VII helmet,with a protective field inbuilt into its innards that can be activated even despite not being worn

artifact.name: Blade of Burden
artifact.description: A relic power sword, given to a Master of the Deathwing upon his promotion from the Knights in the times of Great Crusade

artifact.name: Blade of Corswain
artifact.description: Granted to Corswain by his mentor Alajos in the times of Great Crusade, this masterwork Terrannic Greatsword has been with a Champion of the Dark Angels since time immemorial

artifact.name: Fellbane
artifact.description: Personal weapon of Master Balthasar of the 5th Company, one of the few Heavenflall blades in active service

artifact.name: Lost Mace of Corswain
artifact.description: Once wielded by the legendary Paladin Corswain, long thought lost, it was recovered from the Space Hulk Olethros by the Deathwing

artifact.name: Mace of Redemption
artifact.description: Used in the early M34 by Supreme Grand Master Raphael to slay the Black Lion Daemon Prince upon the world of New Caliban

artifact.name: Raven Sword
artifact.description: An ancient blade of the Dark Angels Legion, the badge of office for the Ravenwing Master since its creation from pure obsidian ten thousand years ago

artifact.name: Sword of Silence
artifact.description: One of the Heavenfall Blades, this one is wielded by Belial, Master of the Deathwing

artifact.name: Traitor's Bane
artifact.description: Weapon taken by Chief Librarian Ezekiel as his personal favourite, it radiates fell power and traps the souls of an Fallen slain in battle. It is said shadows wrap around the blade when Fallen are near

artifact.name: Atonement
artifact.description: A Plasma Pistol recovered from a slain Fallen Angel, its machine spirit uniquely placid in the hands of a Dark Angel. It becomes enraged when fighting the enemies of the Emperor, making itself more deadly than any other Plasma Pistol

artifact.name: Deliverer
artifact.description: Chief Librarian Ezekiel's personal weapon of choice, said to be exceedingly deadly against the Fallen due to its machine spirit

artifact.name: Lion's Spear
artifact.description: An ancient Storm Bolter used by the Deathwing Company

artifact.name: Armour of the Forest
artifact.description: Forged by the Lion, struck from Terran steel it was created in the heart of Caliban's forests and embodied the pragmatism of the Legion in its spartiatic functionality and appearance. Worn by Corswain throughout his life

artifact.name: Deathbringer's Aegis
artifact.description: One of the six sets of battle plate crafted to mark the Lion's re-envisioning of the Hexagrammaton. However, he Aegis was one of the few relics of Hexagramaton to be forged of Terminator plate, and aside from that contained additional neural regulators and medicae infusers that make the armour perfect in resilience for the Masters of the Deathwing in their role

artifact.name: Dreadbringer's Plate
artifact.description: Formed of hardened Ceramite and ferro-crystalline ores native to Caliban, it is another of the Hexagrammaton relics. Because of its composition it could withstand the most potent of corrosives without damaged. It was said that the First Master of the Dreadwing walked through a maelstrom of Phosphex unscathed.

artifact.name: Secret's Shield
artifact.description: A suit of Artificer Armour that was created for the current Chief Librarian of the Chapter, Ezekiel

artifact.name: Shield of Calloson
artifact.description: A relic of the Dark Angels, reserved for Deathwing use. itse resilience is legendary
